name: The Law Office of Doug Bend
overview:
The Law Office of Doug Bend is a full-service law firm with its primary focus on start-ups and small businesses. Located in San Francisco, our office provides quality legal representation to individuals and businesses throughout Northern California.

With extensive experience advising start-ups and small businesses, we offer general advice and counsel to clients seeking opportunities to add value to their business ventures or ways to reduce their risk of litigation at reasonable rates.

At The Law Office of Doug Bend we understand that your choice of attorneys seems endless. The right attorney, however, can help with the formation of your business, as well as play a key role in ensuring its success. It is with this understanding that we commit our energy and experience to serving our clientsâ€™ interests and resolving their legal concerns.

Please contact us today at (415) 633-6841 or info@bendlawoffice.com to schedule a free consultation or to receive more information. We look forward to speaking with you soon.
